long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple timer tool. It allows users to set a timer for a specified number of minutes. The remaining time is displayed and updated every second in the popup window of the extension. When the timer reaches zero, a notification is displayed to the user.
